title: Support Lux Guide (by top 5 LolKing Support guide Editor)
body:
Hi guys !

After a 350k views on my LolKing Nami guide, I decided to create another one on my favourite SoloQ Support champion : Lux

Please feel free to give me any advice, tell what you like and what you don't like ^^

http://www.lolking.net/guides/397229

PS : sorry I don't speak Italian :/
